file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-20-58-06 - VERTICAL STABILIZER - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL VERTICAL STABILIZER - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do a visual inspection on vertical stabilizer and rudders for general condition. B. Related Zones: 321/322/323/324/325. C. (Applicable to EMB-145 ( ) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 24389.5 thru STA X = 26386.7 (SPAR I thru SPAR II). (Applicable to EMB-135 ( ) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 20844.5 thru STA X = 22841.7 (SPAR I thru SPAR II). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY VERTICAL STABILIZER - EXTERNAL ALL 05-20-58-200-801-A ♦ GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION VERTICAL STABILIZER AND RUDDERS - ALL 05-20-58-200-803-A ♦ EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPEC- TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-20-58 Page 1 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-58-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. VERTICAL STABILIZER - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 55-Z324-213-001-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of the vertical stabilizer and rudders, at zones 324/325, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the external visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 27-20-03-000-801-A/400 RUDDER I - REMOVAL AMM TASK 27-20-03-400-801-A/400 RUDDER I - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Vertical stabilizer I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THAT NO RUDDER OR ELEVATOR TASKS ARE DONE AT THE TIME OF THIS INSPECTION. (1) Put the ladder in position. (2) Remove rudder I ( AMM TASK 27-20-03-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-58 Page 2 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the vertical stabilizer zone and rudders for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, skin deformation, fillet sealant condition, erosion, corrosion, deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 601). (2) Examine the rivets that attach the skin to the ribs and spars. (3) Examine the trailing edge ribs (Figure 601). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install rudder I ( AMM TASK 27-20-03-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-58 Page 3 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Trailing Edge Ribs - External General Visual Inspection Figure 601 A ZONES 324 325 B C DET. A 1 1 DET. B DET. C 1 EXTERNAL VISUAL INSPECTION OF THE TRAILING EDGE RIBS. 145AMM050010.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-58 Page 4 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-58-200-803-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. VERTICAL STABILIZER AND RUDDERS - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 55-Z321-213-001-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of the vertical stabilizer and rudders, at zones 321/322/323 within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the external visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Vertical stabilizer H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THAT NO RUDDER OR ELEVATOR TASKS ARE DONE AT THE TIME OF THIS INSPECTION. (1) Put the ladder in position. I. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 602) (Figure 603) SUBTASK 212-003-A (1) Examine the dorsal fin, the vertical-stabilizer leading edge and the front fixed, rear fixed, front movable, rear movable, RH/LH seal fairings of vertical stabilizer for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, skin deformation, fillet sealant condition, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-803-A/600 05-20-58 Page 5 of 8 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Examine the rudders zones for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, skin deformation, fillet sealant condition, erosion, corrosion, deteriorated protective treatment J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-803-A/600 05-20-58 Page 6 of 8 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
